title: Rates by Asen Sokolov
descr: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get!

coverDescription:
Price is what you pay.
Value is what you get!

plans.title: START UP WEBSITE EXAMPLES
plans.descr:
Definition of “Start UP website” is a website consisting of up to five main sections with the total pages not to exceed 8.
With no need of custom plug-ins or databases.

plans.title: BUSINESS WEBSITE EXAMPLES
plans.descr:
Definition of “Business website” is a website consisting of up to seven main sections with the total pages not to exceed 20.
With no need of custom plug-ins or databases.

plans.title: PREMIUM WEBSITE EXAMPLES
plans.descr:
Definition of “Premium website” is a website consisting of up to ten main sections with the total pages not to exceed 40.
With custom plug-ins and databases.
